column5: -15 with a -43 windchill here in southern Minnesota now. Looking for the temps to drop further overnight. Kids are stoked that the governor called off school for tomorrow.
I think I would take a mosquito bite any day over frost bite,it really hurts on the cheeks and neck.OUCH!!!!
Ya,its horrible.It was - 27 with no wind the other day and it felt nice...-2 is T-shirt weather out ice fishing around here.Enjoy it.

High temp here in Hosmer SD today is -12 degrees F. with winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 39 mph.The wind chill right now is -52 degrees F.Low temp. for tonight is -26 degrees F.Weather not fit for man or beast. I'm staying inside,warm and reading Walleye Central forums.Bill
We got 10-12" of snow last night in Southern IL.
Btmbncr- I'm down here in SF. Not bad here, don't want to be outside very long though. Sun is shining here, is it up there?
Gotta go out and get some basic groceries.... - 49 deg F with windchill In Winterpeg @ 1PM. Ice cream should make it.
It was -57 wind chill here earlier this morning in the Dryden area. The guys in the far north country are laughing at us complaining about these temps.
Ya it felt wonderful!! So far our wood pile is taking a serious beat'n ..... Hopefully this will come to an end soon.
Isn't it nice not having to b#tch about the ankle biting flies!
Good grief!! If was -2 here in PA yesterday and I thought that was bitter cold. -57 is just ridiculous.

I'm a wussy. It is way too cold for this little farm boy. House is all but shakin' in this wind. Yard is full of snow blowing off the cornfields and filling in around our buildings.Hoping wind dies down tomorrow so I can start digging out. In the dark it looks like more than my PU and snow plow can handle. Just start chewing away and take my time. Doubt the skid steer will even start or stay running in these temps.House fire two nights ago just north of me. Not a hope in 'ell of the FD saving anything. Wind just pushed the fire through the house in minutes it was gone. Put it in the basement before FD could even do anything. Started by a space heater. Not sure how it went down though. Everyone got out.We are not using our fire place as I don't know how this kind of wind will mess up the draft. Can tell which way the wind is blowing by which rooms are cold. Glad the garage and office are on the north end of the house tonight!You guys be careful out there. Pooch

Feeling your pain, but the good thing is the mosquitoes aren't biting....Just checked the forecast for Atlanta, GA, my home, is calling for 9 above for tomorrow night and they are cancelling school in the area. Be safe, find someone you love, and steal their blankets ...
